summary: "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow" is a famous short story by American author Washington Irving, first published in 1820. Irving wrote it while living in England. The story is about a scary character called the Headless Horseman, a ghostly Hessian soldier who lost his head in battle. It's one of the earliest American stories that people still love, especially around Halloween. This tale has been made into movies many times, including a silent film and a Walt Disney cartoon.
title: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
